segments.text: I'd like to try the chef's special .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am on a diet . Do you have a vegetarian menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The vegetarian dishes are at the last pages of the menu .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I see . I would like to have mashed potatoes and chocolate pudding .
segments.speaker: S1
